channel.title: Reviews
channel.description: The link is of a happy kitty. This rss is for movie and restaurants reviews.

item.title: Akira
item.description: One of the greatest animated films. Used constantly to compare newer sci-fi anime films to date.

item.title: Jinroh
item.description: In a nation in turmoil plots resound for militant forces to take control. Within these groups plans are put in motion to discredit the other.. Have they found someone to play the scapegoat or is this another wolf in sheeps clothing.

item.title: Howl's Moving Castle
item.description: A must see anime film has a deep rooted inspiration from Alice in Wonderland and The Wizard of Oz

item.title: The Matrix
item.description: A great trilogy that tries to let your mind wonder about how you percieve your world. Many watched this and wondered "If we were in the matrix how would you realy know?"

item.title: Olice Garden
item.description: Delicious and ranges from cheap to expensive depending on your tastes. Great deals with there unlimited soup salad and breadsticks leading the way.

item.title: Red Lobster
item.description: The seafood destination for all your lobstertail and crab biscuit needs. A bit pricey but a win in seafood.

item.title: Joes Crabshack
item.description: For good seafood at a decent price you have to go to joes. The bucket of boat trash is a great way to casually enjoy the bounty of the sea.

item.title: Portabello's
item.description: One of downtown Disney's more affordable classy restaurants. Dining here made me truly enjoy the food and take my time to savor great tastes.
